description:
* **This is for the desktop version..The mobile version has the same tools but the interface is different. Please be aware of this

This is a beginners course to Sketchbook Pro. In this very in-depth course you will learn all of the major parts of this very robust and intuitive drawing software.  My goal for you when you complete this course is to start using sketchbook pro as easily as you would traditional media. If you are brand new to digital art the I urge you to take this  course. The skills I will teach you will help you in learning other pieces of art software. In this course you will  :

  • Learn to use the Drawing Tools 
  • Learn to use the Perspective Tools
  • Learn to manage your Brushes and settings
  • Create your own Brush sets and Custom Brushes
  • And so much more

Who this course is for :

  • Any beginner who wants to learn Digital Art Software
  • Art students (traditional and non traditional and self taught)
  • Traditional artists who want to learn Digital
  • Graphic designers who want to learn to Draw more 
  • Anyone who wants to make their own game, graphic novel or illustrations
  • Anyone who is curious about Sketchbook Pro

What this course is not

  • Not for anyone who doesn't have a Tablet (Either for desktop or mobile or ipad, galaxy tab etc) 
  • You cannot do this course with a mouse ( I guess you can start but I recommend getting a tablet first)

Please be aware: *There are no subtitles or closed captions for this course at this time.
I hope you will join me and allow me to be your professional guide on your art journey.
title: Learn Sketchbook Pro in a Weekend
